div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h4: Download Casey-Westfield's new app Android or iPhone.

div.p: Here are some things to remember as we journey through the next few weeks together: Face Masks... Seeing people in face masks can be a little scary for...
Keep Learning! We really miss you, but it is important that you stay healthy! Remember to wash your hands with soap and water, get enough rest, get fresh air,...
Here is the May calendar for the free meals program. May 22 will be the last day.

div.p: Tuesday 4.28.2020 Lunch today is BBQ pork rib on bun.

REMINDER -
Monroe Parents:
For Monroe students who are working through paper packets, tomorrow, Tues. April 28, 2020 will be the next distribution and collection. You may return any completed work and collect the next week's work from 12:30 -2:30 at Monroe gym lobby doors.

Reminder for Parents:
For Jr./Sr. High School students who are working through paper packets,Tues. April 28, 2020 will be the next distribution and collection. You may return any completed work and collect the next two week's work from 12:00-2:00 in the front lobby doors. The 19-20 HS yearbooks will also be available at this time. Please call the HS office if you have questions.

Monday 4.27.2020 LUNCH MENU
Lunch today is Bosco Stick and Marinara Sauce.

For Monroe students who are working through paper packets, Tues. April 28, 2020 will be the next distribution and collection. You may return any completed work and collect the next week's work from 12:30-2:30 pm at Monroe gym lobby doors.
